Package org.jboss.windup.graph

Annotation Type Adjacency

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(METHOD)
public @interface Adjacency
    Workaround, until this is merged and released: https://github.com/Syncleus/Ferma/pull/40
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      String label
      The label of the edges making the adjacency between the vertices.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Direction direction
      The edge direction of the adjacency.
      Adjacency.Operation operation
      The operation the method is performing on the vertex.

    • Element Detail

      • label

        String label
        The label of the edges making the adjacency between the vertices.
        Returns:
        the edge label
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • direction

        org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Direction direction
        The edge direction of the adjacency.
        Returns:
        the direction of the edges composing the adjacency
        Since:
        2.0.0
        Default:
        org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Direction.OUT

      • operation

        Adjacency.Operation operation
        The operation the method is performing on the vertex.
        Returns:
        The operation to be performed.
        Default:
        org.jboss.windup.graph.Adjacency.Operation.AUTO
